title: Sans Serif font, Sample is Caps only.
content:
This font was found on a custom made bottle cap. I am looking to replicate but cannot locate the name of the font. I did use the identifont tool, but no luck there. Any help is appreciated. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [notallwhowander\_green.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024041606/http:/typophile.com/files/notallwhowander_green.jpg) | 24.7 KB |
author: AHGoodwin

comments.content:
It must be **[Ryan (Heavy Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024041606/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream&ffam=Ryan%20BT%20-%20Heavy%20Bold&fid=ef2e16b016de625a494b3a0149fd9c84&fsize=60&text=NOT%20ALL%20WHO%20WANDER%20ARE%20LOST&wrap=2)** by Holly Goldsmith (Bitstream, Design date: 1990-2000)

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024041606/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
That is it. Thank you so much!
